block.p: * Surebridge, Lexington, Mass., which offers business application services, to Hill, Holliday, Connors, Cosmopulos, Boston, part of the Interpublic Group of Cos., to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at $12 million to $15 million. * Boehringer Ingelheim Consumer Healthcare Products, Ridgefield, Conn., part of Boehringer Ingelheim Pharmaceuticals, to Carrafiello Diehl & Associates, Irvington, to handle its Natru-Vent Nasal Spray account, which had been at the Sawtooth Group, Woodbridge, N.J. Billings were estimated at $5 million to $10 million.
